sentences.sContent: She sucked an ice cube into her mouth, and crunched it loudly.
sentences.sCn: 她把一冰块儿含在嘴里，并嘎吱嘎吱地大声嚼起来。

synos.tran: 压碎；嘎扎嘎扎的咬嚼；扎扎地踏过

phrases.pCn: 信贷紧缩；信贷危机（等于credit crisis）

words.tran: 易碎的；发嘎吱嘎吱声的

trans.tranCn: 压碎；嘎扎嘎扎的咬嚼；扎扎地踏过
trans.tranOther: to eat hard food in a way that makes a noise
